name: Climb Jump
description:
Climb Jump is an atmospheric and challenging game with a relaxing jazzy vibe.

You play as a curious cube and must jump and climb endless stairs to see what is at the top. Is there anything at the top?

Simply swipe the screen to launch yourself on your journey but watch out for the drops.

How far will you go?

Features;
- Unlockable Skins, Colours and Music
- Calm and Relaxing Atmosphere
- Minimal & Beautiful Graphics
- No timers, play at your own pace.
- Simple controls and no violence; suitable for any age
- Play in the rain (not real rain)
- Choose between two game views: 2D or 3D

No annoying ads and no in-app purchases! Pay once and enjoy it forever.

Please rate and leave review.

Enjoy :)
